BTTInlineAppleScript: tell application "BetterTouchTool"	set x to get_string_variable "color"	if (x = "255,255,255,255") then		update_touch_bar_widget "398C8FC7-EB6C-452B-9981-1797BA91B528" background_color "255,255,255,255"		set_string_variable "color" to "255,255,255,50"		return "LIGHT"	else		update_touch_bar_widget "398C8FC7-EB6C-452B-9981-1797BA91B528" background_color "255,255,255,50"		set_string_variable "color" to "255,255,255,255"		return "DARK"	end if	end tell

BTTTriggerConfig.BTTTouchBarAppleScriptString: tell application "BetterTouchTool"	set_string_variable "color" to "255,255,255,255"end tell
